title: Your Personal "Kryptonite" Champion
body:
Who's the Champion you hate to play against the most? Your "kryptonite". I'm not talking about the stereotypical {{champion:17}}, {{champion:92}}, {{champion:157}}  and {{champion:126}}, because, let's be honest here, everyone hates them. No, I am talking about the champion that you personally hate playing against, so much so that you consider dodging when you see the enemy team pick him, and even tryhard your ass off in Normals just to win lane against that champion.

For me, personally, it's {{champion:50}}. If any of my friends (all 2 of them :^) ) want to trigger me, they say the name *Swain*. If one of my friends wants to destroy our friendship, he picks Swain. And it all actually started when I was low level, played a champion I had no idea how to play as and got matched against a High-Elo Swain player who I had no idea how to play against. 
(Do keep in mind, this isn't a hate thread on Swain, it's just that I have no idea how to play against him ~~yes it is a hate thread Rito pls remove~~)

replies.body: I know this is super cliche and not expected, but a good {{champion:157}} just fucks me up and forces me under tower in every matchup, no matter if it's top or mid. I always need jungle support to even hope to survive early game without being bullied under jungle because he just trades so fast... e -> auto -> q on me before I can even auto him which puts his trade damage wayyyy above mine and I just don't know how to counter his early game pressure efficiently enough, I know it's all probably because I'm bad but he's just so annoying and frustrating to play against ;n;
i hate this man right here{{champion:80}}
Ah, damn, I feel you, man.

I hate her ultimate so much as an assasin main with juggernauts/divers being a close second, Every god dam game Ive been against Lulu, I wanted to commit a genocide of Lulu mains, THAT GOD DAM FORSAKEN ULTIMATE
not really kryptonite, but every time there is a sona on the enemy team i have to kill her, doesnt matter what position im in, i will roam to wherever she is if i have to

{{champion:122}} A good Darius is nothing to be messed with and even the crappiest Darius player can give me trouble. It's like playing against a Teemo, It's not that its difficult to do, it just takes a lot more concentration to defeat.

I personally feel like if you fight Darius for more than a couple auto attacks you walk away basically ignited with his passive.
